document_data.name: City Guard of Qadib
document_data.mainbody: The '''City Guard''' of the [[Free Cities of Zakhara|Free City]] of [[Qadib]] served as a police force within the city as well as a standing army for the "City of Wands".
document_data.Organization:
The composition of the city guard as of {{Yearlink|1367}}{{AQ-time}} was 2,000 infantry, 500 cavalry, and 700 [[mamluk]]s of the [[Studious Mamluk Society]]. The cavalry was commanded by Prince [[Anir al-Walad al-Hadi|Anir]]. Additionally, 100 [[jann]] composed the palace guard. Qadib's navy consisted of five ships.

During an invasion, each of Qadib's universities was expected to provide magical support in the form of 100 [[Sorcerer (kit)|sorcerers]], [[elemental mage]]s, or [[sha'ir]]s.
document_data.Activities: The navy patrolled the coastal waters of the [[Great Sea]] and [[Al-Haul River]].
